description:
The member of the discipline committee of the student council. http://anidb.net/ch19205 [Muneakira]`s classmate, she`s also the class representative and scolds a lot. She a kunoichi who wears a combat uniform similar to maid clothes and leads the discipline committee battle unit "Hattori Shinobi Troops" consisting only of females.
She serves http://anidb.net/ch19201 [Senhime] but seems to harbor a dubious feeling for her that goes over the master and servant relationship...
name: Hattori Hanzou
